org.xbib.elasticsearch.plugin.cron

Interface CronExecutorService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Executor, ExecutorService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CronThreadPoolExecutor

    public interface CronExecutorService
extends ExecutorService
    Executor service that schedules a task for execution via a cron expression.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void schedule(Runnable task, CronExpression expression)
      Schedules the specified task to execute according to the specified cron expression.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService

        awaitTermination, invokeAll, invokeAll, invokeAny, invokeAny, isShutdown, isTerminated, shutdown, shutdownNow, submit, submit, submit

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.concurrent.Executor

        execute

    • Method Detail

      • schedule

        void schedule(Runnable task,
              CronExpression expression)
        Schedules the specified task to execute according to the specified cron expression.
        Parameters:
        task - the Runnable task to schedule
        expression - a cron expression
